step1.title: Fast & Simple
step1.description: Perfect for small businesses who need a professional online presence quickly. Get a custom one-page website with branding in just 2 business days.

step2.title: Custom Solution

onboarding.help_text: Not sure which option is right for you?

welcome.title: Your business. Selling globally. All year.
welcome.subtitle: Create your perfect website in 15 minutes. Our unique process captures the essence of your brand to build a custom website ready to impress your customers.

fast.title: Fast & effortless
fast.description: Our process is simple, guided, and respects your time.

secure.title: Big results

smart.title: Focus on what matters
smart.description: You bring your business vision; we handle the tech.

welcome.disclaimer: Takes approximately 10-15 minutes. Your progress is automatically saved.

1.title: Welcome
1.description: Let's get started with your business information
1.subtitle: Let's create your perfect website in just a few simple steps.

firstName.label: First Name
firstName.hint: Your first name as you'd like it to appear

lastName.label: Last Name
lastName.hint: Your last name for professional communication

email.label: Email Address
email.hint: We'll use this to send you updates and the final website

privacy.notice: Your information is secure and will only be used to create your website.

2.title: Email Verification
2.description: Verify your email address to continue
2.invalidCode: Invalid verification code. Please check and try again.
2.verificationFailed: Email verification failed. Please try again.

name.label: Business Name
name.hint: The official name of your business

industry.label: Industry
industry.hint: What type of business do you operate?

website.label: Current Website
website.hint: Your current website URL (if you have one)

street.label: Street Address
street.hint: Start typing your address for suggestions

dataUsage.notice: This information will be used to create your business website and may appear publicly.

4.title: Brand Definition
4.description: Define your unique value proposition and competitive positioning

description.label: Business Description
description.placeholder: Describe what your business offers in one sentence that would appeal to a new customer
description.hint: Keep it clear and compelling - think about what makes customers choose you

description.label: Who are your ideal customers?
description.placeholder: Describe your typical customers (age, interests, needs, etc.)
description.hint: Understanding your audience helps us create content that resonates

value.label: Your Unique Value
value.placeholder: What sets you apart from competitors? What do you do better or differently?
value.hint: Think about your strengths, special services, or unique approach

goals.label: Business Goals
goals.placeholder: What are your main business objectives for the next year?
goals.hint: Examples: increase sales, expand market reach, improve customer service

competitors.title: Competitor Analysis
competitors.description: Help us understand your market by sharing competitor websites

urls.label: Competitor Websites
urls.hint: Share up to 5 competitor websites to help us differentiate your brand

analysis.label: Competitive Analysis
analysis.placeholder: What do you like/dislike about your competitors? What gaps do you see in the market?
analysis.hint: Help us understand how to position your business uniquely

keywords.title: Brand Keywords
keywords.description: What words best describe your brand personality?

input.label: Brand Keywords
input.placeholder: Enter keywords that describe your brand (e.g., professional, innovative, reliable)
input.hint: Choose 3-5 words that best represent your brand personality and values

intro.title: Customer Profiling
intro.description: Help us understand your ideal customers by adjusting these sliders to match their typical characteristics.

left.price: Looks for best deals and discounts

right.quality: Willing to pay more for quality

style.description: What design aesthetic do they prefer?

decision.description: How do they make purchasing decisions?

left.instinct: Trusts gut feelings and first impressions

right.deliberate: Takes time to make thoughtful decisions

loyalty.description: How loyal are they to brands?

left.deals: Switches based on price or deals
left.switch: Open to trying new brands and services

right.trust: Sticks with trusted brands and providers

insights.title: Targeting Insights
insights.description: Based on your selections, we'll tailor your website's messaging and design to appeal to your ideal customers.

targeting.title: Website Messaging
targeting.messaging: Content tone and language will match customer preferences
targeting.pricing: Pricing presentation will align with budget expectations
targeting.features: Feature highlights will emphasize what matters most

optimization.title: Design & Layout
optimization.layout: Page layout will suit decision-making style
optimization.content: Visual hierarchy will guide customer journey

tips.honest: Be honest about your actual customers, not who you wish they were
tips.typical: Think about your most typical customers, not outliers
tips.adjust: You can adjust these settings later as your business evolves

6.title: Customer Needs
6.description: Understanding what your customers really need

intro.title: Understanding Customer Challenges
intro.description: Help us understand what problems your customers face and how your business solves them. This insight will shape your website's messaging and positioning.

input.label: What are the main needs customers have from your business?
input.placeholder: Describe the specific challenges your customers experience before they find your business...
input.hint: Focus on the problems you solve - this helps us craft compelling website messaging

examples.title: How your business solves problems:
examples.seo: SEO-optimized content helps customers find you easily
examples.social: Social proof and testimonials build trust

input.label: How does your business solve these problems?
input.placeholder: Explain the specific ways your products or services address customer challenges...
input.hint: Be specific about the benefits and outcomes customers get from choosing you

input.label: How do you exceed customer expectations?
input.placeholder: Describe the special touches or extra value that make customers love working with you...
input.hint: These unique advantages will become key selling points on your website

awareness.title: Awareness Stage
awareness.description: How customers discover they need your solution

consideration.title: Consideration Stage
consideration.description: How customers evaluate and compare options

decision.title: Decision Stage
decision.description: What makes customers choose you over competitors

7.title: Visual Inspiration
7.description: Show us websites and designs you admire

intro.title: Design Inspiration & References
intro.description: Share websites you find visually appealing or functionally impressive. This helps us understand your aesthetic preferences and design direction.

guidelines.title: What to look for in inspiration websites:
guidelines.colors: Color schemes that appeal to you

urls.label: Inspiration Website URLs
urls.hint: Add up to 10 websites that inspire you. Include competitors, similar businesses, or any sites you find well-designed.

categories.title: Quick Categories
categories.description: Click to add sample websites from different industries

examples.title: Describe your preferred style:
examples.clean: Clean and minimalist with lots of white space
examples.bold: Bold and vibrant with strong visual impact
examples.creative: Creative and unique with artistic elements

input.label: Describe your visual preferences
input.placeholder: Tell us about the look and feel you want for your website - colors, layout style, mood, etc...
input.hint: This helps us understand your design direction beyond just inspiration websites

layout.title: Layout Analysis
layout.description: We'll analyze structure and organization patterns

content.title: Content Strategy
content.description: We'll examine how content is presented and organized

interaction.title: User Experience
interaction.description: We'll study navigation and user interaction patterns

tips.title: Tips for better inspiration:
tips.specific: Be specific about what you like
tips.relevant: Choose sites relevant to your industry

8.title: Design Style
8.description: Choose the visual style that best represents your brand

intro.title: Choose Your Design Style
intro.description: Choose the design style that reflects your brand and speaks to your audience. This sets the visual direction of your website but does not affect the sections shown or the written content.

impact.title: Business Impact
impact.conversion: Influence on user actions and decisions

9.title: Image Style
9.description: Choose the visual style for your website's imagery

intro.title: Choose Your Image Style
intro.description: Select the type of imagery that best represents your brand and connects with your audience. This choice will guide all visual content throughout your website.

psychology.title: Psychological Impact
psychology.trust: Professional images build credibility and trust
psychology.attention: Creative visuals capture and hold attention
psychology.memory: Unique imagery makes your brand memorable

technical.title: Technical Benefits
technical.loading: Optimized images ensure fast loading times
technical.scalability: Vector graphics scale perfectly on all devices
technical.responsive: Professional photos work across all screen sizes
technical.accessibility: Clear imagery improves accessibility for all users

strategy.title: Content Strategy Integration
strategy.description: Your chosen image style will influence how we source, create, and optimize all visual content for your website.
strategy.consistency: Consistent visual language across all pages
strategy.quality: High-quality imagery that reflects your brand values
strategy.relevance: Images that support and enhance your message

10.title: Color Palette
10.description: Choose colors that represent your brand perfectly

intro.title: Color Palette Selection
intro.description: Colors play a crucial role in how customers perceive your brand. Choose a palette that reflects your business personality and appeals to your target audience.

customColors.title: Advanced: Custom Colors
customColors.description: Fine-tune your brand colors by selecting a palette above first, then override individual colors here if needed. Most users won't need this section.
customColors.hint: Optional: Choose a palette above to start, then customize individual colors here. Click a color box to pick a color visually, or enter a hex code.

emotional.title: Emotional Impact
emotional.energy: Orange and red create energy and urgency
emotional.calm: Green promotes calm and natural feelings

business.title: Business Benefits
business.conversion: Right colors can increase conversion rates by up to 80%
business.branding: Consistent colors improve brand recognition by 80%
business.accessibility: Proper contrast ensures accessibility for all users
business.recognition: Signature colors make your brand memorable

accessibility.title: Accessibility & Standards
accessibility.description: We ensure all color combinations meet accessibility standards for optimal user experience.
accessibility.contrast: Minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio for text readability
accessibility.colorBlind: Color schemes work for color-blind users
accessibility.consistency: Consistent color usage across all elements

11.title: Website Structure
11.description: Define your website's purpose and organize its content effectively

intro.title: Plan Your Website Structure
intro.description: Define your primary goals and choose the sections that will help you achieve them. A well-structured website guides visitors smoothly toward your desired actions.

selection.label: What is your main goal for this website?
selection.hint: This will influence which sections we recommend and how we structure your content

examples.title: Examples of what you might offer:

list.label: Your Products/Services
list.hint: List your main products or services - this helps us create targeted content for each offering

conversion.title: Conversion Optimization
conversion.trust: Trust signals and social proof positioning

products.priceHint: Leave blank to display "Contact for pricing"

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Product?
deleteConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this product? This action cannot be undone.

cancelUploadConfirm.title: Cancel Upload?
cancelUploadConfirm.description: Photo uploads are in progress. Are you sure you want to cancel?

12.title: Business Assets
12.description: Upload your business logo and photos to personalize your website

intro.title: Business Assets
intro.description: Upload your business logo and photos to personalize your website and build trust with customers.

logo.title: Business Logo
logo.guidelines: Upload a high-quality logo in PNG or JPG format. Maximum file size: 2MB.

upload.label: Upload Logo
upload.hint: Drag and drop your logo here or click to browse files

upload.label: Upload Photos
upload.hint: Upload up to 30 photos, 10MB each. Show your business, team, or services.

lighting.title: Good Lighting
lighting.description: Natural light or well-lit environments work best

composition.title: Clear Composition
composition.description: Focus on the subject, avoid cluttered backgrounds

authenticity.title: Authentic Moments
authenticity.description: Genuine interactions and real business activities

13.title: Language Add-ons
13.description: Select additional languages for your website
13.heading: Choose Additional Languages
13.noResults: No languages found matching your search
13.basePackage: Base Package (Italian and English are included)
13.languageAddonsInfo: Language add-ons are one-time setup fees.

discount.timeout: Verification timed out. Please try again.

discount.helperText: Enter your discount code and click Apply to add it to your order

thankYou.title: Perfect! We have everything we need.
thankYou.message: Our team will analyze your information and prepare a preview tailored to attract your ideal customers and differentiate you from competitors.

notification.title: Email Notification
notification.description: You'll receive an email when it's ready

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: Only after you approve the preview

nextSteps.title: What happens next?
nextSteps.step1: Our team analyzes your responses and creates a custom website preview
nextSteps.step2: You'll receive an email with your preview link within 5 business days
nextSteps.step3: Review the preview and only pay if you're completely satisfied

restart.dialogDescription: This will clear all your progress and return you to the beginning of the onboarding process. Are you sure you want to restart?
restart.successDescription: You've been taken back to the beginning.

meta.title: Custom Software Development - WhiteBoar
meta.description: We combine AI strategy with senior engineering to ship products that learn and automate.

hero.title: Custom Software Development
hero.subtitle: We combine AI strategy with senior engineering to ship products that learn and automate.
hero.description: From copilots and intelligent workflows to customer-facing apps, we design, build, and launch AI-native experiences across every platform.

services.title: AI-native services we deliver
services.aiDesc: Embed LLM copilots, agents, and workflow automation into your stack.
services.apiDesc: Connect your systems and automate workflows with stable, well-documented APIs.
services.ecommerceDesc: Composable storefronts with personalized merchandising, subscriptions, and payments.
services.mobileAppsDesc: Native and cross-platform apps that bring AI-powered experiences to iOS and Android.
services.webDashboardsDesc: Data-rich web apps, internal tools, and analytics hubs with realtime insight.
services.saasDesc: Multi-tenant products with billing, provisioning, and AI functionality baked in.

form.title: Tell Us About Your Project
form.subtitle: Share your vision and we'll help bring it to life
form.descriptionLabel: Describe what you would like us to build
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell us about your project, goals, and any specific requirements...

success.title: Thank you!
success.message: We will be in touch within 2 business days.

errors.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
errors.descriptionTooShort: Please provide more details (at least 20 characters)
errors.submitFailed: Failed to send your request. Please try again.

clients.title: Our Work
clients.subtitle: See what we've built for businesses like yours

meta.title: Terms and Conditions - WhiteBoar
meta.description: Terms and conditions for using WhiteBoar's website creation and hosting services.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using WhiteBoar's services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

serviceProvider.title: 2. Service Provider
serviceProvider.content: WhiteBoar services are provided by Conscious Digital MTÜ, a registered Estonian non-profit organization (registration number 80600079), with registered address at Harju maakond, Tallinn, Sakala tn 7-2, 10141, Estonia. Contact: info@consciousdigital.org

services.title: 3. Services Description
services.intro: WhiteBoar provides AI-driven website creation, branding, and hosting services including:

items.branding: Automated brand identity creation (logo, colors, typography)
items.hosting: Managed website hosting with global CDN

subscription.title: 4. Subscription Terms
subscription.commitment: Base subscription requires a 12-month minimum commitment period
subscription.included: Base subscription includes website hosting and up to 10,000 monthly page views
subscription.overage: Traffic exceeding 1 million monthly visitors will incur an additional charge of €50 per million visitors
subscription.addons: Optional one-time add-ons available for additional features. Add-on fees are non-refundable once setup has been initiated
subscription.cancellation: You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. The 30-day money-back guarantee applies as described in Section 5. No refunds are provided for remaining months after the guarantee period

guarantee.title: 5. Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.content: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee from the date of your first payment. If you are not satisfied with our service within the first 30 days, you may request a full refund by contacting info@consciousdigital.org. After 30 days, no refunds will be provided for subscription fees already paid.

domain.title: 6. Domain and Website Transfer
domain.ownership: You retain ownership of all content you provide to WhiteBoar
domain.registration: Domains are initially registered and maintained in WhiteBoar's name for the duration of your active subscription
domain.transfer: Full domain transfer to your ownership is available upon request after 1 year of active subscription
domain.process: Transfer requests should be sent to info@consciousdigital.org and will be processed within 14 business days
domain.requirements: Account must be in good standing with no outstanding payments

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.yourContent: You retain all rights to content you provide (text, images, logos)
intellectualProperty.generatedContent: AI-generated designs and code created for your website become your property upon full payment
intellectualProperty.platform: WhiteBoar retains all rights to its platform, software, and AI technology
intellectualProperty.license: You grant WhiteBoar a license to use your content solely to provide services to you

items.accurate: Provide accurate business information during onboarding
items.legal: Ensure all content you provide is legal and does not infringe third-party rights
items.compliance: Use the service in compliance with all applicable laws
items.prohibited: Not use the service for illegal activities, spam, or malicious purposes
items.security: Maintain the security of your account credentials

serviceLevel.title: 9. Service Level and Availability
serviceLevel.effort: WhiteBoar provides hosting on a best-effort basis
serviceLevel.uptime: We target 99.9% uptime but provide no SLA guarantees. While we strive for maximum uptime, we do not guarantee uninterrupted service
serviceLevel.maintenance: Scheduled maintenance will be performed with advance notice when possible
serviceLevel.support: Technical support is provided via email at info@consciousdigital.org

limitation.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, WhiteBoar and Conscious Digital MTÜ shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from your use of our services.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.byUser: You may terminate your subscription at any time through your account settings
termination.byUs: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms
termination.effect: Upon termination, your access to the service will cease at the end of the current billing period
termination.data: We will retain your website and data for 30 days after termination, after which it may be permanently deleted

modifications.title: 12. Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

governingLaw.title: 13. Governing Law and Disputes
governingLaw.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Tuscany, Italy, and applicable European Union regulations. Any disputes shall be resolved through good faith negotiation or, if necessary, through arbitration in accordance with Italian arbitration procedures.

contact.title: 14. Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at info@consciousdigital.org

meta.title: Privacy Policy - WhiteBoar
meta.description: Privacy policy and data protection information for WhiteBoar services.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how Conscious Digital MTÜ ("we", "us", or "WhiteBoar") collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our AI-driven website creation and hosting services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws.

controller.title: 2. Data Controller
controller.name: Conscious Digital MTÜ
controller.address: Harju maakond, Tallinn, Sakala tn 7-2, 10141, Estonia

dataCollection.title: 3. Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following types of information:

items.payment: Payment information (processed securely by Stripe. WhiteBoar does not store or have access to your credit card details)

items.assets: Logos, photos, and other materials you upload
items.preferences: Design preferences, color choices, content requirements

items.analytics: Website usage data via Google Analytics (anonymous)
items.logs: Server logs, IP addresses, browser information

items.service: Providing and delivering our AI-driven website creation services
items.branding: Generating custom brand identities and website designs
items.communication: Communicating with you about your service and account
items.improvement: Improving our AI algorithms and service quality. Customer data may be anonymized and aggregated for AI model improvement. Individual identifying data is never used for training AI models
items.legal: Complying with legal obligations and protecting our rights
items.analytics: Understanding how our services are used (anonymized data only)

legalBasis.title: 5. Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR)
legalBasis.intro: We process your personal data based on:

items.contract: Contract performance - to provide the services you requested
items.consent: Your explicit consent for specific processing activities
items.legitimate: Legitimate interests - including fraud prevention, service security, business analytics using anonymized data, and improving service quality. We conduct balancing tests to ensure our interests do not override your rights
items.legal: Legal obligations - to comply with tax and regulatory requirements

dataSharing.title: 6. Data Sharing and Third Parties
dataSharing.intro: We share your information only with:

items.vercel: Vercel - for website hosting and deployment (servers located in EU)
items.supabase: Supabase - for database hosting and user authentication (servers located in EU)
items.stripe: Stripe - for secure payment processing (PCI-DSS compliant)
items.analytics: Google Analytics - for anonymous usage statistics with IP anonymization enabled
items.email: Resend - for transactional email delivery and service communications

dataSharing.location: All data processing occurs within the European Union. We do not transfer data outside the EU.
dataSharing.noSale: We never sell your personal information to third parties.

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.active: We retain your personal data for as long as your account is active
dataRetention.terminated: After account termination, personal information (name, email, contact details) is deleted after 30 days. Generated website code and designs are retained for 90 days to allow recovery if needed, then permanently deleted
dataRetention.legal: Some information may be retained longer where required by law (e.g., tax records for 7 years)
dataRetention.backups: Backup copies are automatically deleted within 90 days

yourRights.title: 8. Your Rights (GDPR)
yourRights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the right to:

items.access: Access - request a copy of your personal data
items.rectification: Rectification - correct inaccurate or incomplete data
items.erasure: Erasure - request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")
items.restriction: Restriction - limit how we use your data
items.portability: Data portability - receive your data in a portable format
items.object: Object - object to certain types of processing
items.withdraw: Withdraw consent - withdraw consent at any time

yourRights.exercise: To exercise any of these rights, contact us at info@consciousdigital.org. We will respond to your request within 30 days as required by GDPR
yourRights.complaint: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority

cookies.title: 9. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.analytics: We use Google Analytics cookies to understand website usage. IP anonymization is enabled, data is retained for 26 months, and all data is anonymized. You can opt out at any time using browser settings or the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on
cookies.essential: Essential cookies for website functionality and user preferences (theme, language)
cookies.noMarketing: We do not use marketing or advertising cookies
cookies.control: You can control cookies through your browser settings or opt out of Google Analytics tracking

security.title: 10. Data Security
security.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data:

items.encryption: SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission
items.secure: Secure server infrastructure with regular security updates
items.access: Limited access to personal data on a need-to-know basis
items.monitoring: Regular security monitoring and vulnerability assessments

security.breach: In case of a data breach, we will notify affected users and authorities as required by law

children.title: 11. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: 12. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: 13. Contact Us
contact.content: For questions about this Privacy Policy or to exercise your data protection rights, please contact us at:
contact.address: Address: Harju maakond, Tallinn, Sakala tn 7-2, 10141, Estonia

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.description: We use essential cookies for site functionality and optional cookies for analytics. You can customize your preferences or accept all cookies.

cookiePreferences.title: Cookie Preferences
cookiePreferences.description: Manage your cookie preferences. You can enable or disable different categories of cookies below.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for the website to function properly. These cookies enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements and encourage them to engage.

meta.title: Contact Us - WhiteBoar
meta.description: Get in touch with WhiteBoar. We're here to help with your questions and project inquiries.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.welcome: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question about our services, need assistance, or want to discuss a potential project, feel free to reach out.
contact.contactInfo: You can also email us directly at

form.title: Send us a message
form.detailsPlaceholder: Tell us about your inquiry or project...

success.title: Thank you!
success.message: We received your message and will get back to you within 2 business days.
